headline: Evercore ISI Keeps Outperform Rating on ExxonMobil (XOM)
summary: Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE:XOM) is one of the 10 Best Oil and Gas Stocks to Buy Now. headline: Under Darren Woods, Exxon Mobil Is Aiming to Cut Its Break-Even Oil Price to $30
summary: Under the leadership of Darren Woods since 2017,  Exxon Mobil  has followed a strategy of investing through the cycle—and the cycle has been a doozy.  In 2020, with roads emptied by a pandemic and oil storage stuffed full, Texas crude futures briefly turned negative.  Over that stretch, Woods, 60, has cut structural costs by $12.7 billion and sold $24 billion of non-core assets, while spending to develop low-cost oil and gas, including through a nearly $60 billion acquisition last year of Texas driller Pioneer Natural Resources.

headline: Chevron Is Following ExxonMobil by Entering the Lithium Sector
summary: Chevron is acquiring land to produce lithium.  The oil companies are slowly building out lower-carbon energy businesses.  Oil giants Chevron (NYSE: CVX) and ExxonMobil (NYSE: XOM) can read the writing on the wall: They can see that fossil fuels will eventually go extinct.
